name: Jchempaint
body:
_**JChemPaint**_ (or JCP for short here) is the editor and viewer for 2D chemical structures developed using [the Chemistry Development Kit (CDK)](http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/cdk/index.php?title=Main_Page).
It is implemented in several forms: a Java application and two varieties of Java applet.

You can now
* see the documentation at [the github Wiki](https://github.com/rwst/jchempaint/wiki) for more information.
* browse the [github source repository](https://github.com/rwst/jchempaint)
* download a recent jar file from [the Plovdiv nexus](http://ambit.uni-plovdiv.bg:8083/nexus/index.html#nexus-search;gav~org.openscience.cdk~jchempaint-nodeps-cdk-1.4.10) or from [the EBI nightly build](http://www.ebi.ac.uk/steinbeck-srv/jchempaint-nightly/)
* the latter also has example HTML on how to deploy the applet
tagline: Chemical 2D structure editor application/applet based on the Chemistry Development Kit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
